content:
# Utterance:

Urgent announcement! 
Dear colleagues ,
please be aware that some of our conference rooms, specifically : Asimov, the Creativity Cove, Albert Einstein, Marie Curie and Galileo Galilei
 will be temporally unavailable  starting 02.11.2021 due to urgent maintenance required to address a persisting ventilation issue that has been identified as a potential risk to both the functionality and safety of the room. 

During this period the access to the meeting rooms will be restricted to allow the maintenance team to conduct necessary repairs and improvements. The anticipated duration of the maintenance is 6 weeks. 
As a result, all reservations for the conference rooms affected need to be rescheduled or relocated to alternative spaces.

Should any concerns or questions regarding this maintenance, please do not hesitate to contact Facilities Manager Robert Dow.

We understand the inconvenience this may cause and sincerely apologize for the short notice. Your flexibility and understanding during this unforeseen circumstance are greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Best regards.

# List of intents:

[
    {
        "intentId": "APr0111",
        "intentName": "Audio_Problems",
        "intent_description": "Poor sound quality, distorted audio, or no audio output from microphones or speakers",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "FMicr11",
                "slotName": "Faulty_microphones",
                "slot_description": "refers to microphones that are not functioning correctly or are experiencing issues",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "lack of sound input",
                    "distorted audio"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "IAset12",
                "slotName": "incorrect_audio_settings",
                "slot_description": "Refers to the configuration or parameters that are not appropriately adjusted to ensure optimal performance",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "microphone_volume",
                    "sensitivity",
                    "input_level",
                    "output_level"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "FSpea13",
                "slotName": "faulty_speakers",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of device  mulfunctions",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "unpleasant_buzzing",
                    "scratching_sound",
                    "signs_of_physycal_external_or_internal_damage"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "VDi0212",
        "intentName": "Video_Display_Issue",
        "intent_description": "refers to a Flickering, distorted, or no video display on the projector or screen. ",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotID": "FPlam21",
                "slotName": "Faulty_projector_lamp",
                "slot_description": "refers to the issues with projector lamp",
                "type": "String"
            },
            {
                "slotID": "LDcab22",
                "slotName": "loose_video_cables",
                "slot_description": "cables are not securely plugged into their respective ports, they can easily become dislodged or partially connected",
                "type": "String ",
            },
            {
                "slotID": "DDcab23",
                "slotName": "damaged_video_cables",
                "slot_description": "Physical wear and tear, bending, crushing, or exposure to environmental factors can cause damage to the cables",
                "type": "String ",
            },
            {
                "slotID": "VIsua24",
                "slotName": "visuals",
                "slot_description": "The screen has poor lighting, or half the team is cropped out.",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "IntentId": "CoPr03",
        "IntentName": "Connectivity_problems",
        "intent_description": "Devices cannot connect to the room's Wi-Fi network or share content wirelessly.",
        "Slots": [
            {
                "slotID": "NIssu31",
                "slotName": "Network_issues",
                "slot_description": "specifies the poor quality or a slow Internet Performance",
                "type": "String ",
            },
            {
                "slotID": "SNa8472",
                "slotName": "Complex_Login_Processes",
                "SlotDescription": "Specifies the long and complex process or MFA to connect to the meeting room equipment",
                "Type": "String"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "IntentId": "DoBo04",
        "IntentName": "Double_Bookings",
        "intent_description": "This occurs when multiple groups reserve the same room at once.",
        "Slots": [
            {
                "slotID": "DTime41",
                "slotName": "time",
                "Type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the time for which the conference room was reserved.",
            },
            {
                "slotID": "DDate42",
                "slotName": "date",
                "Type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the date for which the conference room was reserved."
            },
            {
                "slotID": "DRoom43",
                "slotName": "room",
                "Type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the name or the number of the conference room reserved",
            },
        ]
    }
]

# Instructions:

You are provided with the utterance and the intents. Intents have Intent Ids, name and intent description. For each intent there are also slots associated with them.  Each slot will have a name, datatype, and description. It may also include a field possibleValues which means the slot must match one of the provided values.

Your task is to identify the intent that matches the utterance the most. 
If no intent can be identified, please return: {"prediction_intent": "none _of_the_above"}. Do not extract any slots for any of the intents.

Give your final output as a JSON.  The JSON should always have a key “output”.    If the output is not within this format, you will be heavily penalized.  Do not add any reasoning for your response.
